page.description: Override the main Alpha Five program printer.
page.original:
&ltOBJECT>.PRINTER_OVERRIDE() Syntax &ltOBJECT>.PRINTER_OVERRIDE( Printer_Name as C [, Printer_Options as P [, Save_Old_Options as P ]] ) ArgumentDescription Printer_NameThe printer to use. Printer_OptionsOptional. Default = Use current printer configuration. A dot variable containing the desired printer configuration. Save_Old_OptionsOptional. A dot variable to save the previous printer configuration.
Description The &ltOBJECT>.PRINTER_OVERRIDE() method applies to:
Browses (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltBROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltFORM> pointer or the name of the form) The &ltOBJECT>.PRINTER_OVERRIDE() method sets the printer configuration, and optionally, saves the current configuration before overwriting it. Limitations Desktop applications only. Example saved_report_driver = :report.printer_override(driver_name)
See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
